summary: An ordinance relating to sewers, the drainage of private premises, prescribing the method by which and the manner in which lateral sewer connections may be made, altered, repaired or extended and public sewers reopened and penetrated, and the method by which the cost of same may be collected, and providing for the licensing of persons to make lateral sewer connections, and providing penalties for violations of this ordinance and repealing Ordinance No. 16372 and all other ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
